meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unpleasant or disgusting.
meanings.sent1: The ickiness of the slimy frog made me shiver.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't stand the ickiness of the spoiled milk.
meanings.sent3: The ickiness of the mystery meat made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The ickiness of the situation was like a dark cloud hanging over us.
meanings.sent5: The ickiness of the garbage dump was overwhelming.

meanings.definition: A feeling of disgust or revulsion.
meanings.sent1: Her face twisted in ickiness when she saw the cockroach.
meanings.sent2: The ickiness in my stomach grew as I smelled the rotten eggs.
meanings.sent3: The ickiness of the slimy snail made him jump back.
meanings.sent4: The ickiness of the betrayal lingered in her mind like a bad dream.
meanings.sent5: The ickiness of the dirty restroom was hard to ignore.
